Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Service Delayed near Clark/Division
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing near Clark/Division due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are standing near Clark/Division due to a mechanical problem.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
